name: Beat the aliens
description:
Hello everyone:

This is a simple mini-game in honor to Rafa from Youtube Channel "Yo no salgo a la calle".

You can play with a joystick or keyboard.

Controls:

Button J : Hit

Button Enter: Confirm selection

Button Space or K: Jump

Music:

Keep Your Head Down - 

Assets:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/survival-kit

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/city-kit-roads

https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimatetexturedbuildings.html

FX Sounds:

Punch by Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup

HUD:

https://opengameart.org/content/scroll-themed-hud-bars
